typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerDataDeltaSource
source(output(
		CountryId as integer,
		IsoCountryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Country',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetCountry
CustomerDataDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Customer = last(Customer),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource
Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Customer,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerData
CustomerData select(mapColumn(
		CountryRegion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCustomerData
SelectCustomerData select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName = CountryRegion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreSKSelectCountry
PreSKSelectCountry aggregate(groupBy(IsoCountryName),
	Count = count(1)) ~> Deduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
Deduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
TargetCountry aggregate(groupBy(CountryId),
	IsoCountryName = last(IsoCountryName)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetCountry
Deduplicated1TargetCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName,
		CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
SelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry select(mapColumn(
		TarIsoCountryName = IsoCountryName,
		TarCountryId = CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
SelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry, SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry join(IsoCountryName === TarIsoCountryName,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry filter(isNull(TarCountryId)) ~> FilterInsertCountry
FilterInsertCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> InsertCountry
InsertCountry keyGenerate(output(Sk_CountryId as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SkCountry
SelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry aggregate(Max_TarCountryId = max(toInteger(TarCountryId)) + 0) ~> AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
AggregatedSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry derive(Max_TarCountryId = iif(isNull(Max_TarCountryId),0,Max_TarCountryId)) ~> MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
SkCountry, MaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry join(true() === true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry
JoinMaxSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry derive(CountryId = Sk_CountryId + Max_TarCountryId) ~> DerivedCountry
DerivedCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName,
		CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PostSkCountry
JoinSelectTarSelectDeduplicated1TargetCountry filter(!isNull(TarCountryId)) ~> FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
FilterUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName,
		CountryId = TarCountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
PostSkCountry, UpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
UnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry select(mapColumn(
		TarIsoCountryName = IsoCountryName,
		TarCountryId = CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
PreSKSelectCountry, SelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry join(IsoCountryName === TarIsoCountryName,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry
JoinSelectTarUnionUpdateSelectDeduplicated1PreSKSelectCountry select(mapColumn(
		IsoCountryName,
		CountryId = TarCountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalCountry
FinalCountry aggregate(groupBy(CountryId),
	IsoCountryName = last(IsoCountryName)) ~> Country
Country sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Country',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CountrySink
